name: Renegade Spy
description: Rumor has it that a secret organization has been lording over the world. As a secret agent, you have to climb up each floor in order to reach the penthouse and apprehend the evil ringleaders. Be careful! Guards keep an eye on every corner and traps shift and move at a moments notice. Make sure to watch you step and plan your actions. We'll see you at the top floor!
